mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERFILE (FILENUM, ID, FILENAME, ORIGINALNAME) VALUES (BANK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{fileName}, #{originalName})
INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, BIRTH) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth})
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT M.*, MF.*, R.* FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERFILE MF ON (M.ID = MF.ID) INNER JOIN MEMBERROLE MR ON (M.ID = MR.ID) INNER JOIN ROLE R ON (R.ROLENUM=MR.ROLENUM) WHERE M.ID=#{id} AND M.PW=#{pw}
